item.title: [CA][Control panel & API] - API/Order funnel/Customer area
item.description:
Apr 5, 16:15 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 05/04/2023 15:24 UTC
End Time : 05/04/2023 15:44 UTC
Service impact : api.ovh.com, customer area and order funnel for Canada were temporarily unavailable.
EU customers that have Baremetal products based in Canada couldn't access them through their customer area.
Root cause : Network issue
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Apr 5, 15:49 UTC
Monitoring - Start time : 05/04/2023 15:24 UTC
End time : 05/04/2023 15:44 UTC
Service impact : api.ovh.com, customer area and order funnel for Canada were temporarily unavailable.
EU customers that have Baremetal products based in Canada couldn't access them through their customer area.
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are currently monitoring the situation

item.title: [CA][Support] - Call support
item.description:
Mar 26, 19:51 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 25/03/2023 23:00 UTC
End Time : 26/03/2023 18:54 UTC
Root cause : A delay on a voice gateway caused the issue
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Mar 26, 18:54 UTC
Monitoring - Ongoing actions : All support numbers are now reachable through English and French language options.
Our teams are currently monitoring the situation.

Mar 26, 18:33 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 25/03/2023 23:00 UTC
Service impact : Some customers who try to contact us through our support numbers (1-855-685-5463 and the Premium number), won't be able to get through our support if they chose the French language option.
Customers will need to choose the English language option to in order to contact our support.
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.

item.title: [WorldWide][Support] - ServiceNow
item.description:
Mar 17, 11:43 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 17/03/2023 10:05 UTC
End Time : 17/03/2023 11:41 UTC
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Mar 17, 11:26 UTC
Update - Further investigation reported that support call capacity may be impacted.
You might experience a longer delay before your issue is diagnosed .

Mar 17, 11:12 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 17/03/2023 10:05 UTC
Service impact : ticket might take a longer time to be assigned to our agent
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Workaround : Help Center remains accessible : https://help.ovhcloud.com along with the Manager https://www.ovh.com/manager . If you have a Business or Enterprise level of support, your dedicated phone number is available to reach you technical advisor in case of emergency
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.

item.title: [EU][Customer Service] - Customer Panel & Order funnel
item.description:
Mar 15, 13:45 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 15/03/2023 07:16 UTC
End Time : 15/03/2023 11:10 UTC
Root cause : Side-effect of an operation on the infrastructure
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Mar 15, 11:25 UTC
Monitoring - Update : Our teams have restored service, we are monitoring the incident to confirm resolution.

Mar 15, 09:25 UTC
Identified - Update : The impact on services is still progress, slowdowns may be encountered.

Mar 15, 08:40 UTC
Update - Update : Another degradation took place between 08:00 UTC and 08:07 UTC.

Mar 15, 07:58 UTC
Monitoring - Update : Our teams have solved the issue. We keep for the task in monitoring to confirm the final resolution of the incident.

Mar 15, 07:42 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 15/03/2023 07:16 UTC
Service impact : You may experience difficulties in reaching the API impacting the Customer panel EU, Order funnel EU, and api.ovh.com. The API for the DNS zone section is unavailable.
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.

item.title: [EU/CA][CustomerService] - Customer panel, order funnel, and API slowness
item.description:
Mar 7, 16:20 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 07/03/2023 11:05 UTC
End Time : 07/03/2023 12:30 UTC
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Mar 7, 12:41 UTC
Monitoring - Start time : 07/03/2023 11:05 UTC
End time : 07/03/2023 12:30 UTC
Ongoing actions : We are monitoring the issue the time being.
A fix has been implemented.
We no longer detecting slowness or high error rate.

Mar 7, 12:15 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 07/03/2023 11:05 UTC
Service impact : Customer panel, order funnel, and API operations might fail or be excessively slow.
Ongoing actions : Investigating
We have detected slowness and high error rate on API OVHcloud EU & CA
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.

item.title: [Global][Public Cloud] - Control Panel Access
item.description:
Feb 28, 23:09 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 28/02/2023 16:00 UTC
End Time : 28/02/2023 22:58 UTC
Root cause : The incident was due to a load increase on the GRA clusters.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Feb 28, 21:44 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 28/02/2023 16:00 UTC
Service impact : Some Public Cloud project can't be managed through control panel.
Related Incident : [Global][Public Cloud] - Control Panel Access
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Horizon and APIs remain available.
Our technical teams are working on resolving the issue. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

item.title: [GRA/UK/WAW/DE][Public Cloud] - API
item.description:
Feb 23, 12:53 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 23/02/2023 08:00 UTC
End Time : 23/02/2023 08:40 UTC
Root cause : The incident is due to the following incident: https://public-cloud.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/yg0z378c47dg
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Feb 23, 09:22 UTC
Monitoring - Update : Our teams have corrected the problem, but the identification of the root cause is still in progress.
We are keeping the incident under surveillance until the root cause is identified.

Feb 23, 08:43 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 23/02/2023 08:00 UTC
Service impact : All API call for GRA, UK, WAW and DE region are not answering. Creation, modification and deletion of cloud ressources in GRA and UK region are not possible.
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.

item.title: [EU/CA][Customer Panel][Order funnel][API][corporate websites] - TLSv1.0 and TLSv1.1 End of Life
item.description:
Feb 15, 10:36 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Feb 15, 00:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Feb 1, 01:39 UTC
Update - The scope has been broadened.
The components affected are now also in Canada.

Jan 30, 23:14 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 15/02/2023 00:00 UTC
End time : 15/02/2023 23:59 UTC
Service impact : Customers using outdated OS or browsers with only TLSv1.0 and TLSv1.1 capability will no longer be able to reach our commercial website and the customer panel.
Service improvement : On Wednesday February 15th 2023, OVHcloud will change the TLS configuration of its corporate websites endpoints and customer panel. This
change is performed to stick with industry security standards, we recommend that you upgrade your OS and browser to make sure you use at least TLSv1.2.
